```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r libraries, message = FALSE, results=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(car)
library(effects)
```

```{r load and change fyn}
# Load fynbos stacked df
fyn_df <- read_csv('fynbos_df.csv')

# add in year variable
fyn_df$Year <- lubridate::year(fyn_df$StartDate)
str(fyn_df)
```

```{r run mixed effects model}
# run a mixed effects model; year = fixed; species = random
glm1 <- glmer(Presence ~ Year  + (1|Species_Code), family = 'binomial', data = fyn_df)
```

```{r}
summary(glm1)

# car::Anova
Anova(glm1)
```

```{r}
# Plot effects
plot(allEffects(glm1))
```
